scripts.prod: npm run prod:image:build && npm run prod:image:ship && npm run prod:remote:up
scripts.prod:cleanup: docker compose -p gromka-show -f docker-compose.prod.yml down --remove-orphans && docker builder prune -f
scripts.prod:image:ship: docker save gromka-show-app:prod | gzip | ssh ${PROD_SSH_ALIAS:-gromka} 'gunzip | docker load'
scripts.prod:remote:up: ssh ${PROD_SSH_ALIAS:-gromka} 'cd ${PROD_APP_DIR:-/var/www/gromka.show} && docker compose -p gromka-show -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --remove-orphans'
scripts.prod:remote:down: ssh ${PROD_SSH_ALIAS:-gromka} 'cd ${PROD_APP_DIR:-/var/www/gromka.show} && docker compose -p gromka-show -f docker-compose.prod.yml down --remove-orphans'
scripts.db:generate: docker compose -p gromka-show -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app npx prisma generate
scripts.db:migrate:dev: docker compose -p gromka-show -f docker-compose.dev.yml exec app npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:deploy: docker compose -p gromka-show -f docker-compose.prod.yml exec app npx prisma migrate deploy
